name: Illegal Aliens
blurb: Live the Legend, Save the Galaxy! An Action-RPG/Co-op Adventure game.

rewards.reward: Back Illegal Aliens and receive 3 HD Illegal Aliens desktop wallpapers.
EARLY EARLY BIRD SPECIAL \u2022 Be one of the 1st to back Illegal Aliens and get the DRM free digital download of the game on PC.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL \u2022 Be one of the 1st to back Illegal Aliens and get the DRM free digital download of the game on PC. Gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens

OFFICIAL BACKER \u2022 Get the DRM free digital download of the game on PC. Gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as an Official Backer of Illegal Aliens!

MUSIC BACKER \u2022 Receive a digital download of the official soundtrack to Illegal Aliens comprised of over 20 songs. Receive a download of the behind the scenes making of HD digital documentary. Get the DRM free digital download of the game on PC. Gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as a Music Backer of Illegal Aliens!

GIFT BACKER \u2022 Receive two DRM free digital copies of the game, one for you and one to gift to a friend. Receive a digital download of the soundtrack to Illegal Aliens, the behind the scenes making of HD digital documentary, and gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as a Gift Backer of Illegal Aliens!

ART BACKER \u2022 Receive a digital download of the Illegal Aliens art book. Includes making of concept art, sketches, original photos, and developer/team bios. Receive the digital download of the soundtrack to Illegal Aliens, the behind the scenes making of HD digital documentary, the DRM free digital download of the game on PC, and gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as an Art Backer of Illegal Aliens!

SHIRT BACKER \u2022 Get a Limited Edition one of a kind Illegal Aliens Backer T-Shirt. Receive the  download of the Illegal Aliens art book, the download of the soundtrack to Illegal Aliens, the behind the scenes making of HD digital documentary, the DRM free digital download of the game on PC, and gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as a Shirt Backer of Illegal Aliens!

NOTE BACKER \u2022 Be forever inscribed in the game by writing a message that will appear on a wall somewhere in Illegal Aliens. Messages must be approved. Limit 25 characters. Get the Illegal Aliens Backer T-Shirt, the download of the Illegal Aliens art book, the download of the soundtrack to Illegal Aliens, the behind the scenes making of HD digital documentary, the DRM free digital Download of the game on PC, and gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as a Note Backer of Illegal Aliens.

GOLD BACKER \u2022 Receive a Gold Grapple Gun in game to show your status as a Gold Backer. Receive a Limited Edition autographed poster signed by the Team behind Illegal Aliens. Receive the in-game message from the Note Backer, the Illegal Aliens Backer T-Shirt, the download of the Illegal Aliens art book, the download of the soundtrack to Illegal Aliens, the behind the scenes making of HD digital documentary, the DRM free digital download of the game on PC, and gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as a Gold Backer of Illegal Aliens!

ACHIEVEMENT BACKER \u2022 Be apart of an in-game achievement called "Find the Backers"! For the Achievement players will search to find all the Achievement Backer's cards scattered throughout game. Once found, Players will see a  card with a grayscale picture of your face and your name displayed on it. Receive the Gold Grapple Gun and the autographed poster from the Gold Backer, the in-game message from the Note Backer, the Illegal Aliens Backer T-Shirt, the download of the Illegal Aliens art book, the download of the soundtrack to Illegal Aliens, the behind the scenes making of HD digital documentary, the DRM free digital download of the game on PC, and gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as a Achievement Backer of Illegal Aliens!

BLASTER BACKER \u2022 Work with an artist to design a unique one of a kind weapon that can be found and used by the players in game. Get added to the achievements in the Achievement Backer, the Gold Grapple Gun and the autographed poster from the Gold Backer, the in-game message from the Note Backer, the Illegal Aliens Backer T-Shirt, the download of the Illegal Aliens art book, the download of the soundtrack to Illegal Aliens, the behind the scenes making of HD digital documentary, the DRM free digital download of the game on PC, and gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as a Blaster Backer of Illegal Aliens!

AVATAR BACKER \u2022 Have an NPC's name and face modeled after you or someone you know, that can be interacted with and found roaming within the game world. Get added to the achievements in the Achievement Backer, the Gold Grapple Gun and the autographed poster from the Gold Backer, the in-game message from the Note Backer, the Illegal Aliens Backer T-Shirt, the download of the Illegal Aliens art book, the download of the soundtrack to Illegal Aliens, the behind the scenes making of HD digital documentary, the DRM free digital download of the game on PC, and gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as a Avatar Backer of Illegal Aliens!

VEHICLE BACKER \u2022 Work with an artist to design your own unique spaceship or vehicle that can be found/purchased and used in game. Get the NPC Character from Avatar Backer, added to the achievements in the Achievement Backer, the Gold Grapple Gun and the autographed poster from the Gold Backer, the in-game message from the Note Backer, the Illegal Aliens Backer T-Shirt, the download of the Illegal Aliens art book, the download of the soundtrack to Illegal Aliens, the behind the scenes making of HD digital documentary, the DRM free digital download of the game on PC, and gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as a Vehicle Backer of Illegal Aliens!

TOP BACKER \u2022 Have an asteroid modeled after you or someone you knows face, found floating around in outer space. Players will be able to land on your asteroid and explore! Receive 10 copies of the game to give to friends. Get the NPC Character from Avatar Backer, added to the achievements in the Achievement Backer, the Gold Grapple Gun and the autographed poster from the Gold Backer, the in-game message from the Note Backer, the Illegal Aliens Backer T-Shirt, the download of the Illegal Aliens art book, the download of the soundtrack to Illegal Aliens, the behind the scenes making of HD digital documentary, the DRM free digital download of the game on PC, and gain access to the private community to discuss Illegal Aliens. Plus get listed in the credits as a Top Backer of Illegal Aliens!
